# pathfinder-ebay

[![Build Status](https://ci.altus.vip.ebay.com/ebaykrakn-4389/buildStatus/icon?job=pathfinder-ebay)](https://ci.altus.vip.ebay.com/ebaykrakn-4389/job/pathfinder-ebay) [![Dependency Status](https://appvalidator.vip.qa.ebay.com/nodejs/pathfinder-ebay.svg)](https://appvalidator.vip.qa.ebay.com/nodejs/pathfinder-ebay)
[![Code Coverage](https://badgeme.vip.qa.ebay.com/badge/sonar/v0/coverage/pathfinder-ebay)](http://sonar/dashboard/index?id=pathfinder-ebay)


Client for `pathfinder` service call for logging SOJ events

## Changelog

See   [CHANGELOG.MD](https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/pathfinder-ebay/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#changelog)

# Installation

`npm install pathfinder-ebay --save`

# Usage

```javascript
var pathfinder = require('@ebay/pathfinder-ebay');

```

# API

## Log SOJ
API for logging SOJ events to pulsar directly.

Usage :
```javascript
var SOJData = {sojA: '', sojK:'', sojC:'', clientData:''};
var pathfinder = require('@ebay/pathfinder-ebay');
pathfinder.logEvents(SOJData, request, function (error, status) {
    if(error)
        console.log('Event Logging failed');
    else {
        console.log('Event logged successfully');
    }
});

```
